name: spache-formula
description: Formula to detect the grade level of text according to the (revised) Spache Readability Formula (1974)
author: Titus Wormer <tituswormer@gmail.com>

scripts.test-travis: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks -u exports spec/spache-formula.spec.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint-api && npm run lint-test && npm run lint-style
scripts.make: npm run lint && npm run coverage
